outerHTML:
OctoPrint LXC

OctoPrint is a free and open-source web-based 3D printer control software that allows you to remotely control and monitor your 3D printer from a web interface. It was designed to be compatible with a wide range of 3D printers.

To create a new Proxmox VE OctoPrint LXC, run the following in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update OctoPrint, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/octoprint.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡ - Privilrged

OctoPrint Interface - IP:5000
